meanings.definition: Three times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: The triples scoop ice cream cone was huge!
meanings.sent2: She bought a triples pack of gum for her long flight.
meanings.sent3: The cat's triples tail made it look extra fluffy.
meanings.sent4: The triples challenge was to eat three burgers in one sitting.
meanings.sent5: The triples rainbow in the sky was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: A set of three similar things.
meanings.sent1: The necklace had three triples of pearls.
meanings.sent2: He ordered a plate of triples: fries, onion rings, and mozzarella sticks.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out a hat with triples of bunnies!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room in triples.
meanings.sent5: The painting featured triples of trees in the background.

meanings.sent1: She hoped the sales would triples by the end of the month.
meanings.sent2: The population of the town triples during the summer.
meanings.sent3: His excitement triples every time he sees a puppy.
meanings.sent4: The music triples in volume during the chorus.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden seemed to triples overnight.
